articles.title: Marvel's "Strange" Sequel Opens To $185M - Dark Horizons

articles.title: Chef whose waitress was mocked describes pair's 'hell' - Wales Online
articles.description: Lee Skeet, who runs Cora in Cardiff, has issued an update on a 'whirlwind few days' for him and his front of house employee after she was disrespected and talked down to by a table of guests
